text: Since I was young I always dreamt to be a pilot. I like playing with planes, motors and I feel so happy when I manage to repair my plane if It was broken. However, after passing my baccalaureat degree I didn't obtained the grade to join a public university to study and become a pilot and as you know private universities are so expensive. I felt so sad but I managed to pass to an other thing and I didn't took too much time because I have to make a choise in a few days. After all, it's just a dream so I can succed better in what I will do in the future. I took a few time with myself to find something that can match with my interests. I finally choose to do my studies in electronics and computer programming. It was a personal choise and I was thinking that it's the one and only opportunity to work in an aeroport and enter in the true world of planes. I passed 2 years studying electronics and programming.I will not say It was not interesting but It was not for me. I didn't stopped I wanted to see if I will succeed if I try to do some projects or no. During my last year in the university in Paris I was obliged to make a robot in order to have my diploma. I passed 2 weeks thinking what kind of robot will be better for humanity and will serve probably one day. I decided after all that to make a smart thing for blind people that makes them feel better. From that time I become fun of electronics dedicated to medical issues because I think It's the best way to use technologies. If we don't use that to save people why will we us that. After that I decided to come to Paris because I saw that with my bachelor degree in electronic and computer programming I can do the study that I'm doing doing which is health technology. This is my story and how my life changed in a good way. So be patient and accept what you have.
